1949.HK.summary: Platt Nera International Limited provides IT integrated solutions and support services to financial institutions, government departments, and agencies primarily in administrative, telecommunications, and utilities sectors in Thailand. Its IT integrated solutions comprise a range of services, including design and planning, assessment of hardware and/or software options, sourcing and sale of hardware and/or software, system installation, and launch to trial operation and maintenance, such as system upgrades for existing systems. The company also provides operational, support, upgrade, and maintenance services to IT system. Platt Nera International Limited was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Platt Nera International Limited is a subsidiary of Pynk Holding Limited.

AIT-R.BK.long_name: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited
AIT-R.BK.summary: Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited designs, sells, installs, services, repairs, maintains, and trains information and communication technology network systems in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Sales and Service, and Rental of Equipment. It provides solutions, including carrier grade router/switch, Web/video caching, DDOS protection, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program to work as defined, network function virtualization, and other. The company also offers data center and cloud solutions, such as consolidation and virtualization, unified data center, converged and hyper converged infrastructure, private and public cloud infrastructure, software-defined networking or the network controlled by the program, and other. In addition, it provides collaboration solutions comprising communication through IP/VoIP system or unified communication, video and Web conferencing, contact center, and others; and various enterprise network solutions consisting of router, switch, wireless LAN, WAN optimization, security, application delivery control, DNS server, identity system, network management, and other. Further, the company offers the services in the development of information technology systems to various projects with the combination of concepts in applying technology with the framework in developing the system accordingly. Additionally, it provides managed services managing complicated IT system; and maintenance service on checking the operational condition of the system, which enables the system to operate continually and reduce the downtime period, and preventing problem to occur simultaneously, as well as spare parts for saving the time in solving the problem and mitigating the risks from the damage of equipment. The company also rents computers and electronic equipment. Advanced Information Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

IIG-R.BK.summary: I&I Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a digital and technology consulting company in Thailand. The company provides consultation on computer systems and sell subscription and support on computer software licenses. It also offers services in the areas of business analytics and marketing strategy, data management and technology, customer relationship and experience management, and cross-channel and campaign management. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Ratchathewi, Thailand.

INET-R.BK.summary: Internet Thailand Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides Internet access, and information technology and communication integrated services for businesses and individuals in Thailand. The company operates through two segments, Access Business and Business Solutions. It offers full Internet access services with various speeds through leased lines and MetroLAN network connected to the offices' Intranet networks; and Internet data center services comprising business continuity planning/disaster recovery center, co-location, INET security center, and server leasing services for business organizations or agencies that need to present data through Internet/Intranet for public and private networks. The company also provides cloud services, which is a virtual computing service that includes infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, and software as a service; and EDC network pool services, which is a credit card payment system center linked between banks and other merchants through telecommunications networks, such as landline telephone, mobile phone, and Internet. In addition, it offers online applications, such as online recruitment, mail services, etc. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSET-R.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited constructs data centers in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology, Infrastructure and Telecommunication Network, and Maintenance and Services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

INSET.BK.summary: Infraset Public Company Limited constructs data centers in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Construct of Data Center and Information Technology, Infrastructure and Telecommunication Network, and Maintenance and Services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MFEC-R.BK.summary: MFEC Public Company Limited operates as an information technology (IT) services company in Thailand. The company operates through Systems Integration, Maintenance Service, and IT Professional Service segments. It provides securities trading, mobile financial, gamifcation, managed service, information service on mobile/tablet applications, advertisement/PR/marketing, service for platform management system, and ticketing system for all play types. The company also offers mobile products, software as a service, e-commerce, digital content, payment gateway, financial technology, consulting service and computer system development, IT project management and equipment management, outsourcing IT, audit, warranty management, maintenance, and system integration for cloud and office work. In addition, it provides business analytics, agent management, agent leader, smart quotation, eApplication, iClaim, legal tracking system, iCollection, appraisal collateral, and big data services. MFEC Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MFEC.BK.summary: MFEC Public Company Limited operates as an information technology (IT) services company in Thailand. The company operates through Systems Integration, Maintenance Service, and IT Professional Service segments. It provides securities trading, mobile financial, gamifcation, managed service, information service on mobile/tablet applications, advertisement/PR/marketing, service for platform management system, and ticketing system for all play types. The company also offers mobile products, software as a service, e-commerce, digital content, payment gateway, financial technology, consulting service and computer system development, IT project management and equipment management, outsourcing IT, audit, warranty management, maintenance, and system integration for cloud and office work. In addition, it provides business analytics, agent management, agent leader, smart quotation, eApplication, iClaim, legal tracking system, iCollection, appraisal collateral, and big data services. MFEC Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PT-R.BK.summary: Premier Technology Public Company Limited, through its subsidiary, Datapro Computer Systems Company Limited, distributes and provides services relating to computer and computer systems in Thailand. It develops its own products; and distributes products of other companies. The company's products include hardware and software products, including IT and multimedia products; and system and data management, and application software. It also offers annual maintenance, training and consulting, outsourcing, and other services; and engages in the rental of an office building. The company was formerly known as Premier Engineering and Technology Public Company Limited and changed its name to Premier Technology Public Company Limited in October 2006. Premier Technology Public Company Limited was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SKY-R.BK.summary: Sky ICT Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, engages in information and communication technology (ICT), and system integration businesses in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: System Integration, Sales and Service, and Finance Lease segments. It offers consultation, design, installation, maintenance, procurement, and distribution of products and equipment related to the ICT and system integration. The company also provides CCTV, smart office, smart home, smart city, networks infrastructure, cyber security, and unified communication solutions; and network cabling services, including network cable management, single and multi-mode fiber optic cabling, LAN installation and cable management, and rack cabinet installation for network and server/CCTV security installation. In addition, it distributes IT products, such as computer, notebook, scanner, printer, toner, server, storage, switch, and software products; and non-IT solutions. Further, the company is involved in the finance lease business. Sky ICT Public Company Limited serves clients in the education, banking, security, government, and other sectors. The company was formerly known as CCN-TECH Public Company Limited and changed its name to Sky ICT Public Company Limited July 2017. Sky ICT Public Company Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
